name: @cabin-interactive/qrz-api-client
description: A TypeScript wrapper for the QRZ.com API

scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn clean && yarn test && yarn build
scripts.publish:patch: yarn prepublishOnly && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: yarn prepublishOnly && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: yarn prepublishOnly && npm version major && npm publish

author: Jarrett Green
